column3:
I'm unsure if this is a local issue or not. It would be great if someone else on OSX 10.11 could test the rc1 .dmg to see if it also crashes for them: https://bitcoincore.org/cfields/bitcoin-0.11.1rc1/bitcoin-0.11.1-osx-unsigned.dmg

To reproduce: just double-click the dmg. For me, Finder crashes and I never see the contents of the image.
Will update a 10.10 VM to 10.11 next week and take a closer look.\n
OSX 10.11. I can't reproduce it using provided dmg.\n
Thanks for testing, looks like this is a local issue. Closing for now.\n
